227  -- シミュレーション終了通知信号.
228  --------------------------------------------------------------------------
229  FINISH : out std_logic
230  );

309  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
310  procedure match_axi4_channel(
311  signals : in AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
312  match : out boolean
313  ) is
314  variable ar_match : boolean;
315  variable aw_match : boolean;
316  variable r_match : boolean;
317  variable w_match : boolean;
318  begin
319  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
320  -- ライトアドレスチャネルシグナルの比較
321  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
322  if (WRITE_ENABLE) then
323  aw_match := MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.VALID ,AWVALID_I ) and
324  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.READY ,AWREADY_I ) and
325  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.ID(AWID_I'range) ,AWID_I ) and
326  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.ADDR(AWADDR_I'range),AWADDR_I ) and
327  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.LEN ,AWLEN_I ) and
328  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.SIZE ,AWSIZE_I ) and
329  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.BURST ,AWBURST_I ) and
330  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.LOCK ,AWLOCK_I ) and
331  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.CACHE ,AWCACHE_I ) and
332  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.PROT ,AWPROT_I ) and
333  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.QOS ,AWQOS_I ) and
334  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.REGION ,AWREGION_I) and
335  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AW.USER(AWUSER_I'range),AWUSER_I );
336  else
337  aw_match := TRUE;
338  end if;
339  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
340  -- ライトチャネルシグナル/ライト応答チャネルシグナルの比較
341  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
342  if (WRITE_ENABLE) then
343  w_match := MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.W.VALID ,WVALID_I ) and
344  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.W.READY ,WREADY_I ) and
345  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.B.VALID ,BVALID_I ) and
346  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.B.READY ,BREADY_I ) and
347  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.W.ID(WID_I'range) ,WID_I ) and
348  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.B.ID(BID_I'range) ,BID_I ) and
349  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.W.DATA(WDATA_I'range) ,WDATA_I ) and
350  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.W.STRB(WSTRB_I'range) ,WSTRB_I ) and
351  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.W.LAST ,WLAST_I ) and
352  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.B.RESP ,BRESP_I ) and
353  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.W.USER(WUSER_I'range) ,WUSER_I ) and
354  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.B.USER(BUSER_I'range) ,BUSER_I );
355  else
356  w_match := TRUE;
357  end if;
358  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
359  -- リードアドレスチャネルシグナルの比較
360  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
361  if (READ_ENABLE) then
362  ar_match := MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.VALID ,ARVALID_I ) and
363  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.READY ,ARREADY_I ) and
364  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.ID(ARID_I'range) ,ARID_I ) and
365  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.ADDR(ARADDR_I'range),ARADDR_I ) and
366  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.LEN ,ARLEN_I ) and
367  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.SIZE ,ARSIZE_I ) and
368  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.BURST ,ARBURST_I ) and
369  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.LOCK ,ARLOCK_I ) and
370  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.CACHE ,ARCACHE_I ) and
371  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.PROT ,ARPROT_I ) and
372  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.QOS ,ARQOS_I ) and
373  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.REGION ,ARREGION_I) and
374  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.AR.USER(ARUSER_I'range),ARUSER_I );
375  else
376  ar_match := TRUE;
377  end if;
378  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
379  -- リードデータチャネルシグナルの比較
380  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
381  if (READ_ENABLE) then
382  r_match := MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.R.VALID ,RVALID_I ) and
383  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.R.READY ,RREADY_I ) and
384  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.R.ID(RID_I'range) ,RID_I ) and
385  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.R.DATA(RDATA_I'range) ,RDATA_I ) and
386  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.R.LAST ,RLAST_I ) and
387  MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.R.USER(RUSER_I'range) ,RUSER_I );
388  else
389  r_match := TRUE;
390  end if;
391  match := ar_match and aw_match and r_match and w_match;
392  end procedure;
393  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
395  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
396  procedure match_axi4_channel(
397  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
398  name : in STRING;
399  signals : in AXI4_A_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
400  match : out boolean;
401  signal ADDR : in std_logic_vector;
402  signal LEN : in AXI4_ALEN_TYPE;
403  signal SIZE : in AXI4_ASIZE_TYPE;
404  signal BURST : in AXI4_ABURST_TYPE;
405  signal LOCK : in AXI4_ALOCK_TYPE;
406  signal CACHE : in AXI4_ACACHE_TYPE;
407  signal PROT : in AXI4_APROT_TYPE;
408  signal QOS : in AXI4_AQOS_TYPE;
409  signal REGION : in AXI4_AREGION_TYPE;
410  signal USER : in std_logic_vector;
411  signal ID : in std_logic_vector;
412  signal VALID : in std_logic;
413  signal READY : in std_logic
414  ) is
415  variable count : integer;
416  begin
417  count := 0;
418  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.VALID ,VALID ) = FALSE) then
419  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "VALID " &
420  BIN_TO_STRING(VALID) & " /= " &
421  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.VALID));
422  count := count + 1;
423  end if;
424  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.READY ,READY ) = FALSE) then
425  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "READY " &
426  BIN_TO_STRING(READY) & " /= " &
427  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.READY));
428  count := count + 1;
429  end if;
430  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.ADDR(ADDR'range),ADDR ) = FALSE) then
431  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "ADDR " &
432  HEX_TO_STRING(ADDR ) & " /= " &
433  HEX_TO_STRING(signals.ADDR(ADDR'range)));
434  count := count + 1;
435  end if;
436  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.LEN ,LEN ) = FALSE) then
437  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "LEN " &
438  BIN_TO_STRING(LEN ) & " /= " &
439  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.LEN));
440  count := count + 1;
441  end if;
442  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.SIZE ,SIZE ) = FALSE) then
443  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "SIZE " &
444  BIN_TO_STRING(SIZE ) & " /= " &
445  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.SIZE));
446  count := count + 1;
447  end if;
448  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.BURST ,BURST ) = FALSE) then
449  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "BURST " &
450  BIN_TO_STRING(BURST) & " /= " &
451  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.BURST));
452  count := count + 1;
453  end if;
454  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.LOCK ,LOCK ) = FALSE) then
455  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "LOCK " &
456  BIN_TO_STRING(LOCK ) & " /= " &
457  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.LOCK));
458  count := count + 1;
459  end if;
460  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.CACHE ,CACHE ) = FALSE) then
461  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "CACHE " &
462  BIN_TO_STRING(CACHE) & " /= " &
463  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.CACHE));
464  count := count + 1;
465  end if;
466  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.PROT ,PROT ) = FALSE) then
467  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "PROT " &
468  BIN_TO_STRING(PROT ) & " /= " &
469  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.PROT));
470  count := count + 1;
471  end if;
472  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.QOS ,QOS ) = FALSE) then
473  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "QOS " &
474  HEX_TO_STRING(QOS ) & " /= " &
475  HEX_TO_STRING(signals.QOS));
476  count := count + 1;
477  end if;
478  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.REGION ,REGION) = FALSE) then
479  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "REGION " &
480  HEX_TO_STRING(REGION) & " /= " &
481  HEX_TO_STRING(signals.REGION));
482  count := count + 1;
483  end if;
484  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.ID(ID'range) ,ID ) = FALSE) then
485  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "ID " &
486  HEX_TO_STRING(ID ) & " /= " &
487  HEX_TO_STRING(signals.ID(ID'range)));
488  count := count + 1;
489  end if;
490  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.USER(USER'range),USER ) = FALSE) then
491  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, name & "USER " &
492  HEX_TO_STRING(USER ) & " /= " &
493  HEX_TO_STRING(signals.USER(USER'range)));
494  count := count + 1;
495  end if;
496  match := (count = 0);
497  end procedure;
498  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
504  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
505  procedure match_axi4_aw_channel(
506  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
507  signals : in AXI4_A_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
508  match : out boolean
509  ) is
510  begin
511  match_axi4_channel(
512  core => core , -- I/O :
513  name => "AW" , -- In :
514  signals => signals , -- In :
515  match => match , -- Out :
516  ADDR => AWADDR_I , -- In :
517  LEN => AWLEN_I , -- In :
518  SIZE => AWSIZE_I , -- In :
519  BURST => AWBURST_I , -- In :
520  LOCK => AWLOCK_I , -- In :
521  CACHE => AWCACHE_I , -- In :
522  PROT => AWPROT_I , -- In :
523  QOS => AWQOS_I , -- In :
524  REGION => AWREGION_I , -- In :
525  USER => AWUSER_I , -- In :
526  ID => AWID_I , -- In :
527  VALID => AWVALID_I , -- In :
528  READY => AWREADY_I -- In :
529  );
530  end procedure;
531  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
537  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
538  procedure match_axi4_ar_channel(
539  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
540  signals : in AXI4_A_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
541  match : out boolean
542  ) is
543  begin
544  match_axi4_channel(
545  core => core , -- I/O :
546  name => "AR" , -- In :
547  signals => signals , -- In :
548  match => match , -- Out :
549  ADDR => ARADDR_I , -- In :
550  LEN => ARLEN_I , -- In :
551  SIZE => ARSIZE_I , -- In :
552  BURST => ARBURST_I , -- In :
553  LOCK => ARLOCK_I , -- In :
554  CACHE => ARCACHE_I , -- In :
555  PROT => ARPROT_I , -- In :
556  QOS => ARQOS_I , -- In :
557  REGION => ARREGION_I , -- In :
558  USER => ARUSER_I , -- In :
559  ID => ARID_I , -- In :
560  VALID => ARVALID_I , -- In :
561  READY => ARREADY_I -- In :
562  );
563  end procedure;
564  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
570  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
571  procedure match_axi4_w_channel(
572  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
573  signals : in AXI4_W_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
574  match : out boolean
575  ) is
576  variable count : integer;
577  begin
578  count := 0;
579  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.VALID ,WVALID_I) = FALSE) then
580  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, "WVALID " &
581  BIN_TO_STRING(WVALID_I) & " /= " &
582  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.VALID));
583  count := count + 1;
584  end if;
585  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.READY ,WREADY_I) = FALSE) then
586  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, "WREADY " &
587  BIN_TO_STRING(WREADY_I) & " /= " &
588  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.READY));
589  count := count + 1;
590  end if;
591  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.DATA(WDATA_I'range),WDATA_I ) = FALSE) then
592  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, "WDATA " &
593  HEX_TO_STRING(WDATA_I ) & " /= " &
594  HEX_TO_STRING(signals.DATA(WDATA_I'range)));
595  count := count + 1;
596  end if;
597  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.STRB(WSTRB_I'range),WSTRB_I ) = FALSE) then
598  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, "WSTRB " &
599  BIN_TO_STRING(WSTRB_I ) & " /= " &
600  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.STRB(WSTRB_I'range)));
601  count := count + 1;
602  end if;
603  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.LAST ,WLAST_I ) = FALSE) then
604  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, "WLAST " &
605  BIN_TO_STRING(WLAST_I ) & " /= " &
606  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.LAST));
607  count := count + 1;
608  end if;
609  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.ID(WID_I'range) ,WID_I ) = FALSE) then
610  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, "WID " &
611  HEX_TO_STRING(WID_I ) & " /= " &
612  HEX_TO_STRING(signals.ID(WID_I'range)));
613  count := count + 1;
614  end if;
615  if (MATCH_STD_LOGIC(signals.USER(WUSER_I'range),WUSER_I ) = FALSE) then
616  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, "WUSER " &
617  HEX_TO_STRING(WUSER_I ) & " /= " &
618  HEX_TO_STRING(signals.USER(WUSER_I'range)));
619  count := count + 1;
620  end if;
621  match := (count = 0);
622  end procedure;
623  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
629  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

632  signals : in AXI4_B_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
633  match : out boolean
634  ) is
635  variable count : integer;

639  REPORT_MISMATCH(core, "BVALID " &
640  BIN_TO_STRING(BVALID_I) & " /= " &
641  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.VALID));
642  count := count + 1;
643  end if;

646  BIN_TO_STRING(BREADY_I) & " /= " &
647  BIN_TO_STRING(signals.READY));

664  HEX_TO_STRING(BUSER_I ) & " /= " &

666  count := count + 1;

729  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
735  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
736  procedure match_axi4_channel(
737  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
738  signals : in AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
739  match : out boolean
740  ) is
741  variable aw_match : boolean;
742  variable w_match : boolean;
743  variable b_match : boolean;
744  variable ar_match : boolean;
745  variable r_match : boolean;
746  begin
747  if (WRITE_ENABLE) then
748  match_axi4_aw_channel(core, signals.AW, aw_match);
749  match_axi4_w_channel (core, signals.W , w_match );
750  match_axi4_b_channel (core, signals.B , b_match );
751  else
752  aw_match := TRUE;
753  w_match := TRUE;
754  b_match := TRUE;
755  end if;
756  if (READ_ENABLE) then
757  match_axi4_ar_channel(core, signals.AR, ar_match);
758  match_axi4_r_channel (core, signals.R , r_match );
759  else
760  ar_match := TRUE;
761  r_match := TRUE;
762  end if;
763  match := aw_match and w_match and b_match and ar_match and r_match;
764  end procedure;
765  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
767  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
768  procedure wait_until_xfer_ar(
769  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
770  proc_name : in string;
771  timeout : in integer
772  ) is
773  variable count : integer;
774  begin
775  count := 0;
776  WAIT_LOOP: loop
777  wait until (ACLK'event and ACLK = '1');
778  exit when (ARVALID_I = '1' and ARREADY_I = '1');
779  if (count >= timeout) then
780  EXECUTE_ABORT(core, proc_name, "WAIT AR Time Out!");
781  end if;
782  count := count + 1;
783  end loop;
784  end procedure;
785  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
787  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
788  procedure wait_until_xfer_aw(
789  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
790  proc_name : in string;
791  timeout : in integer
792  ) is
793  variable count : integer;
794  begin
795  count := 0;
796  WAIT_LOOP: loop
797  wait until (ACLK'event and ACLK = '1');
798  exit when (AWVALID_I = '1' and AWREADY_I = '1');
799  if (count >= timeout) then
800  EXECUTE_ABORT(core, proc_name, "WAIT AW Time Out!");
801  end if;
802  count := count + 1;
803  end loop;
804  end procedure;
805  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
807  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
808  procedure wait_until_xfer_r(
809  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
810  proc_name : in string;
811  timeout : in integer;
812  last : in std_logic
813  ) is
814  variable count : integer;
815  begin
816  count := 0;
817  WAIT_LOOP: loop
818  wait until (ACLK'event and ACLK = '1');
819  exit when (RVALID_I = '1' and RREADY_I = '1' and (last = '0' or RLAST_I = '1'));
820  if (count >= timeout) then
821  EXECUTE_ABORT(core, proc_name, "WAIT R Time Out!");
822  end if;
823  count := count + 1;
824  end loop;
825  end procedure;
826  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
828  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

830  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
831  proc_name : in string;
832  timeout : in integer;
833  last : in std_logic
834  ) is
835  variable count : integer;

837  count := 0;
838  WAIT_LOOP: loop
839  wait until (ACLK'event and ACLK = '1');
840  exit when (WVALID_I = '1' and WREADY_I = '1' and (last = '0' or WLAST_I = '1'));
841  if (count >= timeout) then
842  EXECUTE_ABORT(core, proc_name, "WAIT W Time Out!");
843  end if;
844  count := count + 1;
845  end loop;
846  end procedure;

869  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
870  function GEN_INIT_signals return AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE is
871  variable value : AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
872  begin
873  value := AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_DONTCARE;
874  if (MASTER) then
875  case CHANNEL is
876  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AR =>
877  value.AR := AXI4_A_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_NULL;
878  value.AR.READY := '-';
879  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AW =>
880  value.AW := AXI4_A_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_NULL;
881  value.AW.READY := '-';
882  when AXI4_CHANNEL_W =>
883  value.W := AXI4_W_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_NULL;
884  value.W.READY := '-';
885  when AXI4_CHANNEL_R =>
886  value.R := AXI4_R_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_DONTCARE;
887  value.R.READY := '0';
888  when AXI4_CHANNEL_B =>
889  value.B := AXI4_B_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_DONTCARE;
890  value.B.READY := '0';
891  when others =>
892  null;
893  end case;
894  end if;
895  if (SLAVE) then
896  case CHANNEL is
897  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AR =>
898  value.AR := AXI4_A_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_DONTCARE;
899  value.AR.READY := '0';
900  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AW =>
901  value.AW := AXI4_A_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_DONTCARE;
902  value.AW.READY := '0';
903  when AXI4_CHANNEL_W =>
904  value.W := AXI4_W_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_DONTCARE;
905  value.W.READY := '0';
906  when AXI4_CHANNEL_R =>
907  value.R := AXI4_R_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_NULL;
908  value.R.READY := '-';
909  when AXI4_CHANNEL_B =>
910  value.B := AXI4_B_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_NULL;
911  value.B.READY := '-';
912  when others =>
913  null;
914  end case;
915  end if;
916  return value;
917  end function;
918  constant INIT_SIGNALS : AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE := GEN_INIT_SIGNALS;

1034  function GENERATE_KEY_CHANNEL return KEY_TYPE is
1035  begin
1036  case CHANNEL is
1037  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AR => return KEY_AR;
1038  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AW => return KEY_AW;
1039  when AXI4_CHANNEL_R => return KEY_R;
1040  when AXI4_CHANNEL_W => return KEY_W;
1041  when AXI4_CHANNEL_B => return KEY_B;
1042  when others => return KEY_NULL;
1043  end case;
1044  end function;
1045  constant KEY_CHANNEL : KEY_TYPE := GENERATE_KEY_CHANNEL;

1049  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1050  type READ_AXI4_SIGNAL_TYPE is (
1051  READ_NONE ,
1052  READ_ARADDR ,
1053  READ_ARSIZE ,
1054  READ_ARLEN ,
1055  READ_ARBURST ,
1056  READ_ARLOCK ,
1057  READ_ARCACHE ,
1058  READ_ARPROT ,
1059  READ_ARQOS ,
1060  READ_ARREGION ,
1061  READ_ARUSER ,
1062  READ_ARID ,
1063  READ_ARVALID ,
1064  READ_ARREADY ,
1065  READ_AWADDR ,
1066  READ_AWSIZE ,
1067  READ_AWLEN ,
1068  READ_AWBURST ,
1069  READ_AWLOCK ,
1070  READ_AWCACHE ,
1071  READ_AWPROT ,
1072  READ_AWQOS ,
1073  READ_AWREGION ,
1074  READ_AWUSER ,
1075  READ_AWID ,
1076  READ_AWVALID ,
1077  READ_AWREADY ,
1078  READ_RDATA ,
1079  READ_RRESP ,
1080  READ_RLAST ,
1081  READ_RUSER ,
1082  READ_RID ,
1083  READ_RVALID ,
1084  READ_RREADY ,
1085  READ_WDATA ,
1086  READ_WSTRB ,
1087  READ_WLAST ,
1088  READ_WUSER ,
1089  READ_WID ,
1090  READ_WVALID ,
1091  READ_WREADY ,

1093  READ_BUSER ,

1095  READ_BVALID ,
1096  READ_BREADY
1097  );
1098  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1106  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1107  function to_read_axi4_channel_signal(
1108  key_word : KEY_TYPE;
1109  channel : AXI4_CHANNEL_TYPE;
1110  r,w : boolean
1111  ) return READ_AXI4_SIGNAL_TYPE is
1112  begin
1113  if (w and not r) then
1114  case key_word is
1115  when KEY_ID =>
1116  case channel is
1117  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AW => return READ_AWID ;
1118  when AXI4_CHANNEL_W => return READ_WID ;
1119  when AXI4_CHANNEL_B => return READ_BID ;
1120  when others => null;
1121  end case;
1122  when KEY_USER =>
1123  case channel is
1124  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AW => return READ_AWUSER;
1125  when AXI4_CHANNEL_W => return READ_WUSER;
1126  when AXI4_CHANNEL_B => return READ_BUSER;
1127  when others => null;
1128  end case;
1129  when KEY_VALID =>
1130  case channel is
1131  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AW => return READ_AWVALID;
1132  when AXI4_CHANNEL_W => return READ_WVALID;
1133  when AXI4_CHANNEL_B => return READ_BVALID;
1134  when others => null;
1135  end case;
1136  when KEY_READY =>
1137  case channel is
1138  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AW => return READ_AWREADY;
1139  when AXI4_CHANNEL_W => return READ_WREADY;
1140  when AXI4_CHANNEL_B => return READ_BREADY;
1141  when others => null;
1142  end case;
1143  when KEY_DATA =>
1144  case channel is
1145  when AXI4_CHANNEL_W => return READ_WDATA;
1146  when others => null;
1147  end case;
1148  when KEY_LAST =>
1149  case channel is
1150  when AXI4_CHANNEL_W => return READ_WLAST;
1151  when others => null;
1152  end case;

1532  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1539  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1540  procedure read_transaction_size(
1541  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
1542  file stream : TEXT;
1543  proc_name : in string;
1544  val : inout AXI4_ASIZE_TYPE
1545  ) is
1546  variable size : integer;
1547  variable good : boolean;
1548  begin
1549  READ_INTEGER(core, stream, size, good);
1550  if (good) then
1551  case size is
1552  when 128 => val := AXI4_ASIZE_128BYTE;
1553  when 64 => val := AXI4_ASIZE_64BYTE;
1554  when 32 => val := AXI4_ASIZE_32BYTE;
1555  when 16 => val := AXI4_ASIZE_16BYTE;
1556  when 8 => val := AXI4_ASIZE_8BYTE;
1557  when 4 => val := AXI4_ASIZE_4BYTE;
1558  when 2 => val := AXI4_ASIZE_2BYTE;
1559  when 1 => val := AXI4_ASIZE_1BYTE;
1560  when others => READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "KEY=SIZE illegal number=" & INTEGER_TO_STRING(size));
1561  end case;
1562  else READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "KEY=SIZE READ_INTEGER not good");
1563  end if;
1564  end procedure;
1565  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1572  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1573  procedure read_transaction_alen(
1574  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
1575  file stream : TEXT;
1576  proc_name : in string;
1577  val : inout AXI4_ALEN_TYPE
1578  ) is
1579  variable size : integer;
1580  variable good : boolean;
1581  begin
1582  READ_INTEGER(core, stream, size, good);
1583  if (good) then
1584  val := std_logic_vector(to_unsigned(size-1, AXI4_ALEN_WIDTH));
1585  else
1586  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "KEY=SIZE READ_INTEGER not good");
1587  end if;
1588  end procedure;
1589  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1596  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1597  procedure read_transaction_resp(
1598  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
1599  file stream : TEXT;
1600  proc_name : in string;
1601  val : inout AXI4_RESP_TYPE
1602  ) is
1603  variable key_word : KEY_TYPE;
1604  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
1605  begin
1606  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
1607  if (next_event = EVENT_SCALAR) then
1608  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SCALAR);
1609  COPY_KEY_WORD(core, key_word);
1610  case key_word is
1611  when KEY_OKAY => val := AXI4_RESP_OKAY ;
1612  when KEY_EXOKAY => val := AXI4_RESP_EXOKAY;
1613  when KEY_SLVERR => val := AXI4_RESP_SLVERR;
1614  when KEY_DECERR => val := AXI4_RESP_DECERR;
1615  when others => READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "KEY=RESP illegal key_word=" & key_word);
1616  end case;
1617  else
1618  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "KEY=RESP SEEK_EVENT NG");
1619  end if;
1620  end procedure;
1621  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1628  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1629  procedure read_transaction_burst(
1630  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
1631  file stream : TEXT;
1632  proc_name : in string;
1633  val : inout AXI4_ABURST_TYPE
1634  ) is
1635  variable key_word : KEY_TYPE;
1636  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
1637  begin
1638  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
1639  if (next_event = EVENT_SCALAR) then
1640  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SCALAR);
1641  COPY_KEY_WORD(core, key_word);
1642  case key_word is
1643  when KEY_FIXED => val := AXI4_ABURST_FIXED;
1644  when KEY_INCR => val := AXI4_ABURST_INCR;
1645  when KEY_WRAP => val := AXI4_ABURST_WRAP;
1646  when KEY_RESV => val := AXI4_ABURST_RESV;
1647  when others => READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "KEY=BURST illegal key_word=" & key_word);
1648  end case;
1649  else
1650  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "KEY=BURST SEEK_EVENT NG");
1651  end if;
1652  end procedure;
1653  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1659  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1660  procedure transaction_to_addr_and_bytes(
1661  trans : in AXI4_TRANSACTION_SIGNAL_TYPE;
1662  addr : out integer;
1663  size : out integer
1664  ) is
1665  begin
1666  case trans.SIZE is
1667  when AXI4_ASIZE_1BYTE => size := 1; addr := 0;
1668  when AXI4_ASIZE_2BYTE => size := 2; addr := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(trans.ADDR(0 downto 0)));
1669  when AXI4_ASIZE_4BYTE => size := 4; addr := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(trans.ADDR(1 downto 0)));
1670  when AXI4_ASIZE_8BYTE => size := 8; addr := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(trans.ADDR(2 downto 0)));
1671  when AXI4_ASIZE_16BYTE => size := 16; addr := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(trans.ADDR(3 downto 0)));
1672  when AXI4_ASIZE_32BYTE => size := 32; addr := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(trans.ADDR(4 downto 0)));
1673  when AXI4_ASIZE_64BYTE => size := 64; addr := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(trans.ADDR(5 downto 0)));
1674  when AXI4_ASIZE_128BYTE => size := 128; addr := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(trans.ADDR(6 downto 0)));
1675  when others => size := 0; addr := 0;
1676  end case;
1677  end procedure;
1678  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1691  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1692  procedure map_read_axi4_channel(
1693  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
1694  file stream : TEXT;
1695  channel : in AXI4_CHANNEL_TYPE;
1696  read : in boolean;
1697  write : in boolean;
1698  width : in AXI4_SIGNAL_WIDTH_TYPE;
1699  signals : inout AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
1700  event : inout EVENT_TYPE
1701  ) is
1702  constant proc_name : string := "MAP_READ_AXI4_CHANNEL";
1703  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
1704  variable key_word : KEY_TYPE;
1705  procedure read_val(val: out std_logic_vector) is
1706  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
1707  variable read_len : integer;
1708  variable val_size : integer;
1709  begin
1710  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event );
1711  if (next_event /= EVENT_SCALAR) then
1712  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "READ_VAL NG");
1713  end if;
1714  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SCALAR);
1715  STRING_TO_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR(
1716  STR => core.str_buf(1 to core.str_len),
1717  VAL => val,
1718  STR_LEN => read_len,
1719  VAL_LEN => val_size
1720  );
1721  end procedure;
1722  procedure read_val(val: out std_logic) is
1723  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
1724  variable read_len : integer;
1725  variable val_size : integer;
1726  variable vec : std_logic_vector(0 downto 0);
1727  begin
1728  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event );
1729  if (next_event /= EVENT_SCALAR) then
1730  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "READ_VAL NG");
1731  end if;
1732  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SCALAR);
1733  STRING_TO_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR(
1734  STR => core.str_buf(1 to core.str_len),
1735  VAL => vec,
1736  STR_LEN => read_len,
1737  VAL_LEN => val_size
1738  );
1739  val := vec(0);
1740  end procedure;
1741  begin
1742  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "BEGIN");
1743  next_event := event;
1744  MAP_LOOP: loop
1745  case next_event is
1746  when EVENT_SCALAR =>
1747  COPY_KEY_WORD(core, key_word);
1748  case to_read_axi4_channel_signal(key_word, channel, read, write) is
1749  when READ_ARID => read_val(signals.AR.ID (width.ID -1 downto 0));
1750  when READ_ARADDR => read_val(signals.AR.ADDR(width.ARADDR -1 downto 0));
1751  when READ_ARLEN => read_transaction_alen (core, stream, proc_name, signals.AR.LEN );
1752  when READ_ARSIZE => read_transaction_size (core, stream, proc_name, signals.AR.SIZE );
1753  when READ_ARBURST => read_transaction_burst(core, stream, proc_name, signals.AR.BURST);
1754  when READ_ARLOCK => read_val(signals.AR.LOCK );
1755  when READ_ARCACHE => read_val(signals.AR.CACHE );
1756  when READ_ARPROT => read_val(signals.AR.PROT );
1757  when READ_ARQOS => read_val(signals.AR.QOS );
1758  when READ_ARREGION => read_val(signals.AR.REGION);
1759  when READ_ARUSER => read_val(signals.AR.USER(width.ARUSER -1 downto 0));
1760  when READ_ARVALID => read_val(signals.AR.VALID );
1761  when READ_ARREADY => read_val(signals.AR.READY );
1762  when READ_AWID => read_val(signals.AW.ID (width.ID -1 downto 0));
1763  when READ_AWADDR => read_val(signals.AW.ADDR(width.ARADDR -1 downto 0));
1764  when READ_AWLEN => read_transaction_alen (core, stream, proc_name, signals.AW.LEN );
1765  when READ_AWSIZE => read_transaction_size (core, stream, proc_name, signals.AW.SIZE );
1766  when READ_AWBURST => read_transaction_burst(core, stream, proc_name, signals.AW.BURST);
1767  when READ_AWLOCK => read_val(signals.AW.LOCK );
1768  when READ_AWCACHE => read_val(signals.AW.CACHE );
1769  when READ_AWPROT => read_val(signals.AW.PROT );
1770  when READ_AWQOS => read_val(signals.AW.QOS );
1771  when READ_AWREGION => read_val(signals.AW.REGION);
1772  when READ_AWUSER => read_val(signals.AW.USER(width.ARUSER -1 downto 0));
1773  when READ_AWVALID => read_val(signals.AW.VALID );
1774  when READ_AWREADY => read_val(signals.AW.READY );
1775  when READ_RID => read_val(signals.R.ID (width.ID -1 downto 0));
1776  when READ_RUSER => read_val(signals.R.USER (width.RUSER -1 downto 0));
1777  when READ_RDATA => read_val(signals.R.DATA (width.RDATA -1 downto 0));
1778  when READ_RRESP => read_transaction_resp(core, stream, proc_name, signals.R.RESP);
1779  when READ_RLAST => read_val(signals.R.LAST );
1780  when READ_RVALID => read_val(signals.R.VALID );
1781  when READ_RREADY => read_val(signals.R.READY );
1782  when READ_WID => read_val(signals.W.ID (width.ID -1 downto 0));
1783  when READ_WUSER => read_val(signals.W.USER (width.WUSER -1 downto 0));
1784  when READ_WDATA => read_val(signals.W.DATA (width.WDATA -1 downto 0));
1785  when READ_WSTRB => read_val(signals.W.STRB (width.WDATA/8-1 downto 0));
1786  when READ_WLAST => read_val(signals.W.LAST );
1787  when READ_WVALID => read_val(signals.W.VALID );
1788  when READ_WREADY => read_val(signals.W.READY );
1789  when READ_BID => read_val(signals.B.ID (width.ID -1 downto 0));
1790  when READ_BUSER => read_val(signals.B.USER (width.BUSER -1 downto 0));
1791  when READ_BRESP => read_transaction_resp(core, stream, proc_name, signals.B.RESP);
1792  when READ_BVALID => read_val(signals.B.VALID );
1793  when READ_BREADY => read_val(signals.B.READY );
1794  when others => exit MAP_LOOP;
1795  end case;
1796  when EVENT_MAP_END => exit MAP_LOOP;
1797  when others => exit MAP_LOOP;
1798  end case;
1799  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
1800  if (next_event = EVENT_SCALAR) then
1801  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SCALAR);
1802  end if;
1803  end loop;
1804  event := next_event;
1805  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "END");
1806  end procedure;
1807  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1819  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1820  procedure map_read_axi4_transaction(
1821  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
1822  file stream : TEXT;
1823  addr_width : in integer;
1824  auser_width : in integer;
1825  duser_width : in integer;
1826  buser_width : in integer;
1827  id_width : in integer;
1828  trans : inout AXI4_TRANSACTION_SIGNAL_TYPE;
1829  event : inout EVENT_TYPE
1830  ) is
1831  constant proc_name : string := "AXI4_CORE.MAP_READ_AXI4_TRANSACTION";
1832  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
1833  variable key_word : KEY_TYPE;
1834  variable len : integer;
1835  variable pos : integer;
1836  variable number_bytes : integer;
1837  variable address : integer;
1838  variable data_bytes : integer;
1839  variable burst_len : integer;
1840  begin
1841  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "BEGIN");
1842  next_event := event;
1843  pos := trans.DATA_LEN;
1844  READ_MAP_LOOP: loop
1845  case next_event is
1846  when EVENT_SCALAR =>
1847  COPY_KEY_WORD(core, key_word);
1848  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "KEY=" & key_word);
1849  case key_word is
1850  when KEY_SIZE => read_transaction_size (core, stream, proc_name, trans.SIZE );
1851  when KEY_RESP => read_transaction_resp (core, stream, proc_name, trans.RESP );
1852  when KEY_BURST => read_transaction_burst(core, stream, proc_name, trans.BURST);
1853  when KEY_LOCK => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.LOCK , len);
1854  when KEY_CACHE => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.CACHE , len);
1855  when KEY_PROT => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.PROT , len);
1856  when KEY_QOS => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.QOS , len);
1857  when KEY_REGION => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.REGION, len);
1858  when KEY_ADDR => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.ADDR (addr_width -1 downto 0), len);
1859  when KEY_AUSER => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.AUSER(auser_width -1 downto 0), len);
1860  when KEY_DUSER => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.DUSER(duser_width -1 downto 0), len);
1861  when KEY_BUSER => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.BUSER(buser_width -1 downto 0), len);
1862  when KEY_ID => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.ID (id_width -1 downto 0), len);
1863  when KEY_DATA => READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR (core, stream, trans.DATA (trans.DATA'high downto pos), len);
1864  pos := pos + len;
1865  when others => exit READ_MAP_LOOP;
1866  end case;
1867  when EVENT_MAP_END => exit READ_MAP_LOOP;
1868  when others => exit READ_MAP_LOOP;
1869  end case;
1870  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
1871  if (next_event = EVENT_SCALAR) then
1872  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SCALAR);
1873  end if;
1874  end loop;
1875  event := next_event;
1876  trans.DATA_LEN := pos;
1877  transaction_to_addr_and_bytes(trans, address, number_bytes);
1878  data_bytes := (pos+7)/8;
1879  burst_len := (address + data_bytes + number_bytes - 1) / number_bytes;
1880  trans.LEN := std_logic_vector(TO_UNSIGNED(burst_len-1, AXI4_ALEN_WIDTH));
1881  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "END");
1882  end procedure;
1883  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1889  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1890  procedure local_sync(
1891  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
1892  signal sync_req : out SYNC_REQ_VECTOR(0 downto 0);
1893  signal sync_ack : in SYNC_ACK_VECTOR(0 downto 0)
1894  ) is
1895  constant proc_name : string := "LOCAL_SYNC";
1896  variable sync_count : SYNC_REQ_VECTOR(0 downto 0);
1897  begin
1898  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "BEGIN");
1899  sync_count(0) := SYNC_LOCAL_WAIT;
1900  SYNC_BEGIN(sync_req, sync_count);
1901  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "SYNC");
1902  SYNC_END (sync_req, sync_ack, sync_count);
1903  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "END");
1904  end procedure;
1905  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1910  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1911  procedure execute_check(
1912  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
1913  file stream : TEXT
1914  ) is
1915  constant proc_name : string := "EXECUTE_CHECK";
1916  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
1917  variable keyword : KEY_TYPE;
1918  variable match : boolean;
1919  variable axi_signals : AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
1920  variable gpi_signals : std_logic_vector(GPI'range);
1921  begin
1922  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "BEGIN");
1923  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
1924  case next_event is
1925  when EVENT_MAP_BEGIN =>
1926  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_MAP_BEGIN);
1927  axi_signals := AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_DONTCARE;
1928  gpi_signals := (others => '-');
1929  MAP_READ_LOOP: loop
1930  MAP_READ_PREPARE_FOR_NEXT(
1931  SELF => core , -- I/O:
1932  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:
1933  EVENT => next_event -- I/O:
1934  );
1935  map_read_axi4_channel(
1936  core => core , -- I/O:
1937  stream => stream , -- I/O:
1938  channel => channel , -- In :
1939  read => READ_ENABLE , -- In :
1940  write => WRITE_ENABLE , -- In :
1941  width => WIDTH , -- In :
1942  signals => axi_signals , -- I/O:
1943  event => next_event -- I/O:
1944  );
1945  MAP_READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR(
1946  SELF => core , -- I/O:
1947  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:
1948  KEY => "GPI" , -- In :
1949  VAL => gpi_signals , -- I/O:
1950  EVENT => next_event -- I/O:
1951  );
1952  case next_event is
1953  when EVENT_SCALAR =>
1954  COPY_KEY_WORD(core, keyword);
1955  EXECUTE_UNDEFINED_MAP_KEY(core, stream, keyword);
1956  when EVENT_MAP_END =>
1957  exit MAP_READ_LOOP;
1958  when others =>
1959  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "need EVENT_MAP_END but " &
1960  EVENT_TO_STRING(next_event));
1961  end case;
1962  end loop;
1963  match_axi4_channel(core, axi_signals, match);
1964  MATCH_GPI (core, gpi_signals, GPI, match);
1965  when others =>
1966  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "SEEK_EVENT NG");
1967  end case;
1968  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "END");
1969  end procedure;
1970  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1975  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1976  procedure execute_wait(
1977  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
1978  file stream : TEXT
1979  ) is
1980  constant proc_name : string := "EXECUTE_WAIT";
1981  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
1982  variable keyword : KEY_TYPE;
1983  variable wait_count : integer;
1984  variable scan_len : integer;
1985  variable timeout : integer;
1986  variable wait_on : boolean;
1987  variable axi_match : boolean;
1988  variable gpi_match : boolean;
1989  variable axi_signals : AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
1990  variable gpi_signals : std_logic_vector(GPI'range);
1991  begin
1992  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "BEGIN");
1993  timeout := DEFAULT_WAIT_TIMEOUT;
1994  wait_on := FALSE;
1995  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
1996  case next_event is
1997  when EVENT_SCALAR =>
1998  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SCALAR);
1999  STRING_TO_INTEGER(
2000  STR => core.str_buf(1 to core.str_len),
2001  VAL => wait_count,
2002  STR_LEN => scan_len
2003  );
2004  if (scan_len = 0) then
2005  wait_count := 1;
2006  end if;
2007  if (wait_count > 0) then
2008  for i in 1 to wait_count loop
2009  wait until (ACLK'event and ACLK = '1');
2010  end loop;
2011  end if;
2012  wait_count := 0;
2013  when EVENT_MAP_BEGIN =>
2014  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_MAP_BEGIN);
2015  axi_signals := AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_DONTCARE;
2016  gpi_signals := (others => '-');
2017  MAP_READ_LOOP: loop
2018  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "MAP_READ_LOOP");
2019  MAP_READ_PREPARE_FOR_NEXT(
2020  SELF => core , -- I/O:
2021  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:
2022  EVENT => next_event -- I/O:
2023  );
2024  map_read_axi4_channel(
2025  core => core , -- I/O:
2026  stream => stream , -- I/O:
2027  channel => channel , -- In :
2028  read => READ_ENABLE , -- In :
2029  write => WRITE_ENABLE , -- In :
2030  width => WIDTH , -- In :
2031  signals => axi_signals , -- I/O:
2032  event => next_event -- I/O:
2033  );
2034  MAP_READ_STD_LOGIC_VECTOR(
2035  SELF => core , -- I/O:
2036  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:
2037  KEY => "GPI" , -- In :
2038  VAL => gpi_signals , -- I/O:
2039  EVENT => next_event -- I/O:
2040  );
2041  MAP_READ_INTEGER(
2042  SELF => core , -- I/O:
2043  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:
2044  KEY => "TIMEOUT" , -- In :
2045  VAL => timeout , -- I/O:
2046  EVENT => next_event -- I/O:
2047  );
2048  MAP_READ_BOOLEAN(
2049  SELF => core , -- I/O:
2050  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:
2051  KEY => "ON" , -- In :
2052  VAL => wait_on , -- I/O:
2053  EVENT => next_event -- I/O:
2054  );
2055  case next_event is
2056  when EVENT_SCALAR =>
2057  COPY_KEY_WORD(core, keyword);
2058  EXECUTE_UNDEFINED_MAP_KEY(core, stream, keyword);
2059  when EVENT_MAP_END =>
2060  exit MAP_READ_LOOP;
2061  when others =>
2062  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "need EVENT_MAP_END but " &
2063  EVENT_TO_STRING(next_event));
2064  end case;
2065  end loop;
2066  if (wait_on) then
2067  SIG_LOOP:loop
2068  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "SIG_LOOP");
2069  wait_on_signals;
2070  match_axi4_channel(axi_signals, axi_match);
2071  gpi_match := MATCH_STD_LOGIC(gpi_signals, GPI);
2072  exit when(axi_match and gpi_match);
2073  if (ACLK'event and ACLK = '1') then
2074  if (timeout > 0) then
2075  timeout := timeout - 1;
2076  else
2077  EXECUTE_ABORT(core, proc_name, "Time Out!");
2078  end if;
2079  end if;
2080  end loop;
2081  else
2082  CLK_LOOP:loop
2083  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "CLK_LOOP");
2084  wait until (ACLK'event and ACLK = '1');
2085  match_axi4_channel(axi_signals, axi_match);
2086  gpi_match := MATCH_STD_LOGIC(gpi_signals, GPI);
2087  exit when(axi_match and gpi_match);
2088  if (timeout > 0) then
2089  timeout := timeout - 1;
2090  else
2091  EXECUTE_ABORT(core, proc_name, "Time Out!");
2092  end if;
2093  end loop;
2094  end if;
2095  when others =>
2096  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "SEEK_EVENT NG");
2097  end case;
2098  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "END");
2099  end procedure;
2100 begin
2101  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2102  -- メインチャネル.
2103  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2104  CHANNEL_M: if (CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_M) generate
2105  PROCESS_M: process
2106  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2107  -- 各種変数の定義.
2108  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2109  file stream : TEXT;
2110  variable core : CORE_TYPE;
2111  variable keyword : KEY_TYPE;
2112  variable operation : OPERATION_TYPE;
2113  variable gpo_signals : std_logic_vector(GPO'range);
2114  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2120  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2121  procedure execute_sync(
2122  variable core : inout CORE_TYPE;
2123  file stream : TEXT;
2124  operation : in OPERATION_TYPE
2125  ) is
2126  constant proc_name: string := "EXECUTE_SYNC";
2127  variable port_num : integer;
2128  variable wait_num : integer;
2129  begin
2130  REPORT_DEBUG (core, proc_name, "BEGIN");
2131  READ_SYNC_ARGS(core, stream, operation, port_num, wait_num);
2132  REPORT_DEBUG (core, proc_name, "PORT=" & INTEGER_TO_STRING(port_num) &
2133  " WAIT=" & INTEGER_TO_STRING(wait_num));
2134  local_sync(core, SYNC_LOCAL_REQ, SYNC_LOCAL_ACK);
2135  if (SYNC_REQ'low <= port_num and port_num <= SYNC_REQ'high) then
2136  CORE_SYNC(core, port_num, wait_num, SYNC_REQ, SYNC_ACK);
2137  end if;
2138  REPORT_DEBUG (core, proc_name, "END");
2139  end procedure;
2140  begin
2141  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2142  -- ダミープラグコアの初期化.
2143  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2144  CORE_INIT(
2145  SELF => core, -- 初期化するコア変数.
2146  NAME => NAME, -- コアの名前.
2147  VOCAL_NAME => FULL_NAME, -- メッセージ出力用の名前.
2148  STREAM => stream, -- シナリオのストリーム.
2149  stream_NAME => SCENARIO_FILE, -- シナリオのストリーム名.
2150  OPERATION => operation -- コアのオペレーション.
2151  );
2152  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2153  -- 変数の初期化.
2154  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2155  gpo_signals := (others => 'Z');
2156  core.debug := 0;
2157  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2158  -- 信号の初期化
2159  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2160  SYNC_REQ <= (0 =>10, others => 0);
2161  SYNC_LOCAL_REQ <= ( others => 0);
2162  SYNC_TRANS_REQ <= ( others => 0);
2163  FINISH <= '0';
2164  REPORT_STATUS <= core.report_status;
2165  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2166  -- リセット解除待ち
2167  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2168  wait until(ACLK'event and ACLK = '1' and ARESETn = '1');
2169  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2170  -- メインオペレーションループ
2171  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2172  while (operation /= OP_FINISH) loop
2173  REPORT_STATUS <= core.report_status;
2174  READ_OPERATION(core, stream, operation, keyword);
2175  case operation is
2176  when OP_DOC_BEGIN => execute_sync (core, stream, operation);
2177  when OP_SCALAR =>
2178  case keyword is
2179  when KEY_SYNC => execute_sync (core, stream, operation);
2180  when others => EXECUTE_UNDEFINED_SCALAR(core, stream, keyword);
2181  end case;
2182  when OP_MAP =>
2183  REPORT_DEBUG(core, string'("MAIN_LOOP:OP_MAP(") & keyword & ")");
2184  case keyword is
2185  when KEY_AR |
2186  KEY_AW |
2187  KEY_R |
2188  KEY_W |
2189  KEY_B => EXECUTE_SKIP (core, stream);
2190  when KEY_REPORT => EXECUTE_REPORT(core, stream);
2191  when KEY_DEBUG => EXECUTE_DEBUG (core, stream);
2192  when KEY_SAY => EXECUTE_SAY (core, stream);
2193  when KEY_WAIT => execute_wait (core, stream);
2194  when KEY_CHECK => execute_check (core, stream);
2195  when KEY_OUT => EXECUTE_OUT (core, stream, gpo_signals, GPO);
2196  when KEY_SYNC => execute_sync (core, stream, operation);
2197  when KEY_READ => if (READ_ENABLE ) then
2198  EXECUTE_SKIP(core, stream);
2199  else
2200  EXECUTE_UNDEFINED_MAP_KEY(core, stream, keyword);
2201  end if;
2202  when KEY_WRITE => if (WRITE_ENABLE) then
2203  EXECUTE_SKIP(core, stream);
2204  else
2205  EXECUTE_UNDEFINED_MAP_KEY(core, stream, keyword);
2206  end if;
2207  when others => EXECUTE_UNDEFINED_MAP_KEY(core, stream, keyword);
2208  end case;
2209  when OP_FINISH => exit;
2210  when others => null;
2211  end case;
2212  end loop;
2213  REPORT_STATUS <= core.report_status;
2214  FINISH <= '1';
2215  if (FINISH_ABORT) then
2216  assert FALSE report "Simulation complete." severity FAILURE;
2217  end if;
2218  wait;
2219  end process;
2220  end generate;
2221  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2222  -- アドレスチャネル
2223  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2224  CHANNEL_A:if (CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AW or CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AR) generate
2225  PROCESS_A: process
2226  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
2227  -- 各種変数の定義.
2228  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
2229  file stream : TEXT;
2230  variable core : CORE_TYPE;
2231  variable keyword : KEY_TYPE;
2232  variable operation : OPERATION_TYPE;
2233  variable out_signals : AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
2234  variable chk_a_signals : AXI4_A_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
2235  variable tran_info : AXI4_TRANSACTION_SIGNAL_TYPE;
2236  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2240  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2241  procedure execute_output(signals: in AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE) is
2242  begin
2243  if (MASTER and WRITE_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AW) then
2244  AWADDR_O <= signals.AW.ADDR(AWADDR_O'range)after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2245  AWVALID_O <= signals.AW.VALID after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2246  AWLEN_O <= signals.AW.LEN after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2247  AWSIZE_O <= signals.AW.SIZE after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2248  AWBURST_O <= signals.AW.BURST after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2249  AWLOCK_O <= signals.AW.LOCK after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2250  AWCACHE_O <= signals.AW.CACHE after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2251  AWPROT_O <= signals.AW.PROT after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2252  AWQOS_O <= signals.AW.QOS after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2253  AWREGION_O<= signals.AW.REGION after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2254  AWUSER_O <= signals.AW.id(AWUSER_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2255  AWID_O <= signals.AW.id(AWID_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2256  end if;
2257  if (MASTER and READ_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AR) then
2258  ARADDR_O <= signals.AR.ADDR(ARADDR_O'range)after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2259  ARVALID_O <= signals.AR.VALID after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2260  ARLEN_O <= signals.AR.LEN after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2261  ARSIZE_O <= signals.AR.SIZE after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2262  ARBURST_O <= signals.AR.BURST after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2263  ARLOCK_O <= signals.AR.LOCK after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2264  ARCACHE_O <= signals.AR.CACHE after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2265  ARPROT_O <= signals.AR.PROT after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2266  ARQOS_O <= signals.AR.QOS after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2267  ARREGION_O<= signals.AR.REGION after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2268  ARUSER_O <= signals.AR.id(ARUSER_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2269  ARID_O <= signals.AR.id(ARID_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2270  end if;
2271  if (SLAVE and WRITE_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AW) then
2272  AWREADY_O <= signals.AW.READY after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2273  end if;
2274  if (SLAVE and READ_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AR) then
2275  ARREADY_O <= signals.AR.READY after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2276  end if;
2277  end procedure;
2278  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2283  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2284  procedure read_transaction_info(
2285  proc_name : in string ;
2286  variable timeout : inout integer
2287  ) is
2288  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
2289  variable addr_width : integer;
2290  variable auser_width: integer;
2291  variable duser_width: integer;
2292  variable buser_width: integer;
2293  begin
2294  case CHANNEL is
2295  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AR =>
2296  addr_width := WIDTH.ARADDR;
2297  auser_width := WIDTH.ARUSER;
2298  duser_width := WIDTH.RUSER;
2299  buser_width := 1;
2300  when AXI4_CHANNEL_AW =>
2301  addr_width := WIDTH.AWADDR;
2302  auser_width := WIDTH.AWUSER;
2303  duser_width := WIDTH.WUSER;
2304  buser_width := WIDTH.BUSER;
2305  when others =>
2306  null;
2307  end case;
2308  timeout := DEFAULT_WAIT_TIMEOUT;
2309  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
2310  case next_event is
2311  when EVENT_MAP_BEGIN =>
2312  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_MAP_BEGIN);
2313  MAP_READ_LOOP: loop
2314  MAP_READ_PREPARE_FOR_NEXT(
2315  SELF => core , -- I/O:
2316  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:
2317  EVENT => next_event -- I/O:
2318  );
2319  map_read_axi4_transaction(
2320  core => core , -- I/O:
2321  stream => stream , -- I/O:
2322  addr_width => addr_width , -- In :
2323  auser_width=> auser_width , -- In :
2324  duser_width=> duser_width , -- In :
2325  buser_width=> buser_width , -- In :
2326  id_width => WIDTH.ID , -- In :
2327  trans => tran_info , -- I/O:
2328  event => next_event -- I/O:
2329  );
2330  MAP_READ_INTEGER(
2331  SELF => core , -- I/O:
2332  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:
2333  KEY => "TIMEOUT" , -- In :
2334  VAL => timeout , -- I/O:
2335  EVENT => next_event -- I/O:
2336  );
2337  case next_event is
2338  when EVENT_SCALAR =>
2339  COPY_KEY_WORD(core, keyword);
2340  EXECUTE_UNDEFINED_MAP_KEY(core, stream, keyword);
2341  when EVENT_MAP_END =>
2342  exit MAP_READ_LOOP;
2343  when others =>
2344  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "need EVENT_MAP_END but " &
2345  EVENT_TO_STRING(next_event));
2346  end case;
2347  end loop;
2348  when others =>
2349  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "SEEK_EVENT NG");
2350  end case;
2351  end procedure;

2356  constant proc_name : string := "EXECUTE_TRANSACTION_MASTER_READ_ADDR";

2361  tran_info.DUSER := (others => '-');

2367  out_signals.AR.USER(ARUSER_O'range) := tran_info.AUSER(ARUSER_O'range);

2374  out_signals.AR.CACHE := tran_info.CACHE;

2497  procedure execute_channel_scalar_operation is

2499  SKIP_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SCALAR);
2500  end procedure;
2501  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2503  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2504  procedure execute_channel_map_operation is
2505  constant proc_name : string := "EXECUTE_CHANNEL_MAP_OPERATION";
2506  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
2507  begin
2508  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "BEGIN");
2509  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_MAP_BEGIN);
2510  MAP_READ_LOOP: loop
2511  MAP_READ_PREPARE_FOR_NEXT(
2512  SELF => core , -- I/O:
2513  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:
2514  EVENT => next_event -- I/O:
2515  );
2516  map_read_axi4_channel(
2517  core => core , -- In :
2518  stream => stream , -- I/O:
2519  channel => CHANNEL , -- In :
2520  read => READ_ENABLE , -- In :
2521  write => WRITE_ENABLE , -- In :
2522  width => WIDTH , -- In :
2523  signals => out_signals , -- I/O:
2524  event => next_event -- Out:
2525  );
2526  execute_output(out_signals);
2527  case next_event is
2528  when EVENT_SCALAR =>
2529  COPY_KEY_WORD(core, keyword);
2530  case keyword is
2531  when KEY_DEBUG => EXECUTE_DEBUG (core, stream);
2532  when KEY_REPORT => EXECUTE_REPORT(core, stream);
2533  when KEY_SAY => EXECUTE_SAY (core, stream);
2534  when KEY_WAIT => execute_wait (core, stream);
2535  when KEY_CHECK => execute_check (core, stream);
2536  when others => EXECUTE_UNDEFINED_MAP_KEY(core, stream, keyword);
2537  end case;
2538  when EVENT_MAP_END =>
2539  exit MAP_READ_LOOP;
2540  when others =>
2541  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "need EVENT_MAP_END but " &
2542  EVENT_TO_STRING(next_event));
2543  end case;
2544  end loop;
2545  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "END");
2546  end procedure;
2547  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2549  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2550  procedure execute_channel_operation is
2551  constant proc_name : string := "EXECUTE_CHANNEL_OPERATION";
2552  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
2553  variable seq_level : integer;
2554  begin
2555  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "BEGIN");
2556  seq_level := 0;
2557  SEQ_LOOP: loop
2558  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
2559  case next_event is
2560  when EVENT_SEQ_BEGIN =>
2561  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SEQ_BEGIN);
2562  seq_level := seq_level + 1;
2563  when EVENT_SEQ_END =>
2564  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SEQ_END );
2565  seq_level := seq_level - 1;
2566  when EVENT_MAP_BEGIN =>
2567  execute_channel_map_operation;
2568  when EVENT_SCALAR =>
2569  execute_channel_scalar_operation;
2570  when EVENT_ERROR =>
2571  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "SEEK_EVENT NG");
2572  when others =>
2573  SKIP_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
2574  -- ERROR
2575  end case;
2576  exit when (seq_level <= 0);
2577  end loop;
2578  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "END");
2579  end procedure;
2580  begin
2581  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2582  -- ダミープラグコアの初期化.
2583  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2584  CORE_INIT(
2585  SELF => core, -- 初期化するコア変数.
2586  NAME => NAME, -- コアの名前.
2587  VOCAL_NAME => FULL_NAME, -- メッセージ出力用の名前.
2588  STREAM => stream, -- シナリオのストリーム.
2589  STREAM_NAME => SCENARIO_FILE, -- シナリオのストリーム名.
2590  OPERATION => operation -- コアのオペレーション.
2591  );
2592  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2593  -- 変数の初期化.
2594  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2595  out_signals := INIT_SIGNALS;
2596  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2597  -- 信号の初期化
2598  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2599  SYNC_LOCAL_REQ <= (others => 0);
2600  SYNC_TRANS_REQ <= (others => 0);
2601  FINISH <= '0';
2602  REPORT_STATUS <= core.report_status;
2603  execute_output(out_signals);
2604  core.debug := 0;
2605  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2606  -- メインオペレーションループ
2607  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2608  while (operation /= OP_FINISH) loop
2609  REPORT_STATUS <= core.report_status;
2610  READ_OPERATION(core, stream, operation, keyword);
2611  case operation is
2612  when OP_DOC_BEGIN => local_sync(core, SYNC_LOCAL_REQ, SYNC_LOCAL_ACK);
2613  when OP_MAP =>
2614  REPORT_DEBUG(core, string'("MAIN_LOOP:OP_MAP(") & keyword & ")");
2615  if (keyword = KEY_CHANNEL) then
2616  execute_channel_operation;
2617  elsif (keyword = KEY_REPORT ) then
2618  EXECUTE_REPORT(core, stream);
2619  elsif (keyword = KEY_SYNC ) then
2620  local_sync(core, SYNC_LOCAL_REQ, SYNC_LOCAL_ACK);
2621  EXECUTE_SKIP(core, stream);
2622  elsif (CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AR and MASTER and READ_ENABLE and keyword = KEY_READ ) then
2623  execute_transaction_master_read_addr;
2624  elsif (CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AR and SLAVE and READ_ENABLE and keyword = KEY_READ ) then
2625  execute_transaction_slave_read_addr;
2626  elsif (CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AW and MASTER and WRITE_ENABLE and keyword = KEY_WRITE) then
2627  execute_transaction_master_write_addr;
2628  elsif (CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_AW and SLAVE and WRITE_ENABLE and keyword = KEY_WRITE) then
2629  execute_transaction_slave_write_addr;
2630  else
2631  REPORT_DEBUG(core, string'("MAIN_LOOP:OP_MAP:SKIP BEGIN"));
2632  EXECUTE_SKIP(core, stream);
2633  REPORT_DEBUG(core, string'("MAIN_LOOP:OP_MAP:SKIP END"));
2634  end if;
2635  when OP_SCALAR =>
2636  if (keyword = KEY_SYNC) then
2637  local_sync(core, SYNC_LOCAL_REQ, SYNC_LOCAL_ACK);
2638  else
2639  EXECUTE_UNDEFINED_SCALAR(core, stream, keyword);
2640  end if;
2641  when OP_FINISH => exit;
2642  when others => null;
2643  end case;
2644  end loop;
2645  REPORT_STATUS <= core.report_status;
2646  FINISH <= '1';
2647  if (FINISH_ABORT) then
2648  assert FALSE report "Simulation complete." severity FAILURE;
2649  end if;
2650  wait;
2651  end process;
2652  end generate;
2653  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2654  -- データチャネル
2655  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2656  CHANNEL_D:if (CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_W or CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_B or CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_R) generate
2657  PROCESS_D: process
2658  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
2659  -- 各種変数の定義.
2660  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
2661  file stream : TEXT;
2662  variable core : CORE_TYPE;
2663  variable keyword : KEY_TYPE;
2664  variable operation : OPERATION_TYPE;
2665  variable out_signals : AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
2666  variable chk_r_signals : AXI4_R_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
2667  variable chk_w_signals : AXI4_W_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
2668  variable chk_b_signals : AXI4_B_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE;
2669  variable tran_info : AXI4_TRANSACTION_SIGNAL_TYPE;
2670  variable aligned_addr : integer;
2671  variable number_bytes : integer;
2672  variable lower_lane : integer;
2673  variable upper_lane : integer;
2674  variable burst_len : integer;
2675  variable data_pos : integer;
2676  variable data_bits : integer;
2677  variable data_bytes : integer;
2678  variable timeout : integer;
2679  variable match : boolean;
2680  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2684  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2685  procedure execute_output(
2686  signals : in AXI4_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE
2687  ) is
2688  begin
2689  if (MASTER and WRITE_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_W) then
2690  WDATA_O <= signals.W.DATA(WDATA_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2691  WLAST_O <= signals.W.LAST after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2692  WSTRB_O <= signals.W.STRB(WSTRB_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2693  WUSER_O <= signals.W.USER(WUSER_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2694  WID_O <= signals.W.ID(WID_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2695  WVALID_O <= signals.W.VALID after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2696  end if;
2697  if (MASTER and WRITE_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_B) then
2698  BREADY_O <= signals.B.READY after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2699  end if;
2700  if (MASTER and READ_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_R) then
2701  RREADY_O <= signals.R.READY after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2702  end if;
2703  if (SLAVE and WRITE_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_W) then
2704  WREADY_O <= signals.W.READY after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2705  end if;
2706  if (SLAVE and WRITE_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_B) then
2707  BRESP_O <= signals.B.RESP after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2708  BUSER_O <= signals.B.USER(BUSER_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2709  BID_O <= signals.B.ID(BID_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2710  BVALID_O <= signals.B.VALID after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2711  end if;
2712  if (SLAVE and READ_ENABLE and CHANNEL = AXI4_CHANNEL_R) then
2713  RDATA_O <= signals.R.DATA(RDATA_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2714  RRESP_O <= signals.R.RESP after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2715  RLAST_O <= signals.R.LAST after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2716  RUSER_O <= signals.R.USER(RUSER_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2717  RID_O <= signals.R.ID(RID_O'range) after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2718  RVALID_O <= signals.R.VALID after OUTPUT_DELAY;
2719  end if;
2720  end procedure;
2721  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2727  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2728  procedure get_transaction_info(
2729  proc_name : in string;
2730  DATA_WIDTH : in integer
2731  ) is
2732  begin
2733  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "GET_TRANSACTION_INFO BEGIN");
2734  wait until (TRAN_I.VALID'event and TRAN_I.VALID = '1');
2735  tran_info := TRAN_I;
2736  transaction_to_addr_and_bytes(tran_info, aligned_addr, number_bytes);
2737  case DATA_WIDTH is
2738  when 16 => lower_lane := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(tran_info.ADDR(0 downto 0)));
2739  when 32 => lower_lane := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(tran_info.ADDR(1 downto 0)));
2740  when 64 => lower_lane := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(tran_info.ADDR(2 downto 0)));
2741  when 128 => lower_lane := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(tran_info.ADDR(3 downto 0)));
2742  when 256 => lower_lane := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(tran_info.ADDR(4 downto 0)));
2743  when 512 => lower_lane := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(tran_info.ADDR(5 downto 0)));
2744  when 1024 => lower_lane := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(tran_info.ADDR(6 downto 0)));
2745  when others => lower_lane := 0;
2746  end case;
2747  timeout := 10000;
2748  burst_len := TO_INTEGER(unsigned(tran_info.LEN))+1;
2749  data_pos := 0;
2750  data_bits := tran_info.DATA_LEN;
2751  data_bytes := (data_bits+7)/8;
2752  if (number_bytes - aligned_addr > data_bytes) then
2753  upper_lane := lower_lane + data_bytes - 1;
2754  else
2755  upper_lane := lower_lane + number_bytes - aligned_addr - 1;
2756  end if;
2757  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "GET_TRANSACTION_INFO END");
2758  end procedure;
2759  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2767  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2768  procedure generate_r_channel_signals(
2769  proc_name : in string;
2770  last : in boolean;
2771  default : in std_logic;
2772  signals : out AXI4_R_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE
2773  ) is
2774  constant word_bytes : integer := WIDTH.RDATA/8;
2775  begin
2776  signals.USER := tran_info.DUSER;
2777  signals.ID := tran_info.ID;
2778  signals.VALID := '1';
2779  signals.READY := '1';
2780  if (last) then
2781  signals.RESP := tran_info.RESP;
2782  signals.LAST := '1';
2783  else
2784  signals.RESP := (others => default);
2785  signals.LAST := '0';
2786  end if;
2787  for lane in 0 to word_bytes-1 loop
2788  if (lower_lane <= lane and lane <= upper_lane) then
2789  for bit in 0 to 7 loop
2790  if (data_pos < data_bits) then
2791  signals.DATA(lane*8+bit) := tran_info.DATA(data_pos);
2792  data_pos := data_pos + 1;
2793  else
2794  signals.DATA(lane*8+bit) := default;
2795  end if;
2796  end loop;
2797  else
2798  signals.DATA(lane*8+7 downto lane*8) := (lane*8+7 downto lane*8 => default);
2799  end if;
2800  end loop;
2801  lower_lane := (upper_lane + 1) mod word_bytes;
2802  upper_lane := lower_lane + number_bytes - 1;
2803  if (upper_lane >= word_bytes) then
2804  upper_lane := word_bytes - 1;
2805  end if;
2806  end procedure;
2807  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2815  -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2816  procedure generate_w_channel_signals(
2817  proc_name : in string;
2818  last : in boolean;
2819  default : in std_logic;
2820  signals : out AXI4_W_CHANNEL_SIGNAL_TYPE
2821  ) is
2822  constant word_bytes : integer := WIDTH.WDATA/8;
2823  begin
2824  signals.USER := tran_info.DUSER;
2825  signals.VALID := '1';
2826  signals.READY := '1';
2827  if (last) then
2828  signals.LAST := '1';
2829  else
2830  signals.LAST := '0';
2831  end if;
2832  for lane in 0 to word_bytes-1 loop
2833  signals.STRB(lane) := '0';
2834  if (lower_lane <= lane and lane <= upper_lane) then
2835  for bit in 0 to 7 loop
2836  if (data_pos < data_bits) then
2837  signals.DATA(lane*8+bit) := tran_info.DATA(data_pos);
2838  data_pos := data_pos + 1;
2839  signals.STRB(lane) := '1';
2840  else
2841  signals.DATA(lane*8+bit) := default;
2842  end if;
2843  end loop;
2844  else
2845  signals.DATA(lane*8+7 downto lane*8) := (lane*8+7 downto lane*8 => default);
2846  end if;
2847  end loop;
2848  lower_lane := (upper_lane + 1) mod word_bytes;
2849  upper_lane := lower_lane + number_bytes - 1;
2850  if (upper_lane >= word_bytes) then
2851  upper_lane := word_bytes - 1;
2852  end if;
2853  end procedure;

3031  MAP_READ_PREPARE_FOR_NEXT(
3032  SELF => core , -- I/O:
3033  STREAM => stream , -- I/O:

3070  procedure execute_channel_operation is
3071  constant proc_name : string := "EXECUTE_CHANNEL_OPERATION";
3072  variable next_event : EVENT_TYPE;
3073  variable seq_level : integer;
3074  begin
3075  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "BEGIN");
3076  seq_level := 0;
3077  SEQ_LOOP: loop
3078  SEEK_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
3079  case next_event is
3080  when EVENT_SEQ_BEGIN =>
3081  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SEQ_BEGIN);
3082  seq_level := seq_level + 1;
3083  when EVENT_SEQ_END =>
3084  READ_EVENT(core, stream, EVENT_SEQ_END );
3085  seq_level := seq_level - 1;
3086  when EVENT_MAP_BEGIN =>
3087  execute_channel_map_operation;
3088  when EVENT_SCALAR =>
3089  execute_channel_scalar_operation;
3090  when EVENT_ERROR =>
3091  READ_ERROR(core, proc_name, "SEEK_EVENT NG");
3092  when others =>
3093  SKIP_EVENT(core, stream, next_event);
3094  -- ERROR
3095  end case;
3096  exit when (seq_level <= 0);
3097  end loop;
3098  REPORT_DEBUG(core, proc_name, "END");
3099  end procedure;
